title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: The bug description for Bug 8142 is unclear, and it's difficult to understand.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided. To understand the issue, we need information about what happens when you try to access scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
EB: The expected behavior is missing, and it's essential to outline what should occur when trying to access the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
SR: To help investigate this issue, please provide a clear and detailed description of what you are doing when you encounter the problem. Include the steps you follow to access the scoped type hierarchy on a binary project and what you expect to see. This information will help in identifying the problem and providing a solution.
